objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F5F9FF;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E5EFFF;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#2A4B8C;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#5B7BC0;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,220 C250,180 400,260 550,240 C750,220 900,180 1080,240 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M0,860 C150,900 350,840 550,880 C750,920 900,860 1080,920 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='rgba(91,123,192,0.03)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='rgba(91,123,192,0.05)'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Breathable mesh upper for maximum ventilation
• Responsive Boost midsole technology
• Slip-on design with sock-like fit
• Water-resistant lightweight construction

product_details.name: Adidas ClimaCool Boost Golf Shoes - Ultimate Comfort & Performance in White
product_details.description:
• Breathable mesh upper construction for maximum ventilation
• Sleek white and silver colorway with blue outsole accent
• Responsive Boost midsole technology for energy return
• Slip-on design with sock-like fit for easy wear
• Durable rubber outsole with strategic grip pattern
• Lightweight and flexible construction for natural movement
• Water-resistant mesh material keeps feet dry
• Cushioned footbed for all-day comfort
• Modern athletic styling suitable for both golf course and casual wear
• Silver reflective 3-stripe branding for enhanced visibility

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and sporty design for a golf shoe product advertisement. It features a clean light-blue background with layered wave patterns at the top and bottom for dynamic visual appeal. The layout begins with a bold headline ("heading") followed by a sleek subheading ("subheading"), establishing a premium look. The central portion contains a concise feature list ("description") highlighting key product benefits. Beneath the product image ("product_image"), a supportive tagline ("tagline") reinforces performance messaging. A prominent price tag ("price") and clear call-to-action ("cta" over "cta_background") complete the conversion goals. This composition beautifully balances visuals, content, and structure.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2A4B8C
- Medium Blue: #5B7BC0
- Light Gradient Blue: #F5F9FF to #E5EFFF
- Text Gray: #333333
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a streamlined white sneaker accented with minimalist tones. The base of the shoe is a bright clean white (#FFFFFF), featured predominantly on the fabric upper. Metallic silver-gray stripes (#A9A9A9) create contrast and draw attention, symbolizing motion and modernity. The outsole adds depth with a navy blue (#0C3B5E), offering a bold grounding effect. A hint of steel-gray (#C0C0C0) on the midsole blends smoothly with the upper while maintaining definition. These colors are harmoniously blended for a sleek look while the metallic and dark shades highlight key areas with clarity. Ideal for banners, the palette suggests innovation and clarity.
